companyInfo.name: Rimac Merchandise Store
companyInfo.description: Official merchandise for Rimac Automobili fans

policies.returns: 30-day return policy for unworn items with tags attached
policies.shipping: Free shipping on orders over €50 within EU. Standard shipping 3-5 business days.
policies.refunds: Refunds processed within 5-7 business days after item received

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes! We ship worldwide. EU shipping is free over €50, international shipping costs vary by location.

faqs.question: How do I track my order?
faqs.answer: You'll receive a tracking number via email once your order ships. You can track it on our website or the carrier's site.

faqs.question: What sizes are available?
faqs.answer: Our t-shirts come in sizes XS-XXL. Check the size guide on each product page for measurements.

commonIssues.solution: We'll send a prepaid return label. Once we receive the item, we'll ship the correct size within 2 business days.
We apologize! Please send photos to support@rimac-store.com and we'll send a replacement immediately.

escalation.escalationMessage: I want to make sure you receive the best assistance. Let me connect you with our specialist team at support@rimac-store.com who can help you further.
